summary: This is an email chain from January 6, 2020, between FBI personnel discussing the need to contact a witness in Sweden for an interview related to the Jeffrey Epstein/Ghislaine Maxwell investigation. The case agent from the FBI New York Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking Task Force seeks guidance on proper channels to contact the witness.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named as a subject in the FBI investigation, along with Ghislaine Maxwell, regarding child exploitation and human trafficking.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Named as a subject in the FBI investigation, along with Jeffrey Epstein, regarding child exploitation and human trafficking.

persons.name: Special Agent FBI New York Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking
persons.context: The FBI case agent leading the investigation into Epstein and Maxwell, seeking to contact a witness in Sweden for an interview.

persons.name: F.B.I. Legat Copenhagen
persons.context: The FBI Legal Attaché office in Copenhagen, whose area of responsibility includes Sweden, is being copied on the email regarding contacting a witness in Sweden.

events.title: FBI Coordination to Contact Swedish Witness
events.description: FBI case agent emails colleagues to coordinate the proper channels for contacting a witness in Sweden for an interview related to the Epstein/Maxwell investigation.
personsInvolved: Special Agent FBI New York Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking

keyFacts: The FBI was actively investigating Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell for child exploitation and human trafficking as of January 2020.
There was a witness located in Sweden that the FBI sought to interview in connection with the Epstein/Maxwell case.
The FBI case agent was following protocol to coordinate with the FBI Legal Attaché in Copenhagen (which covers Sweden) before contacting the witness.
The email indicates international investigative efforts, with the FBI's New York office working with its legat in Europe.
